title: Synthetic Health Database Platform
description: Platform for generating synthetic health databases for epidemiology, biostatistics, and public health surveillance. Dual-engine Python + R with support for CIE-10 codes, demographic data, epidemic models (SIR/SEIR), survival analysis, and surveillance systems.

creators.name: Tasso Suazo, Rodolfo
creators.affiliation: Grupo de Ciencia de Datos para la Salud Publica, Escuela de Salud Publica, Universidad de Chile
